top.title: Anthropic Said to Be in Talks to Raise Funding at a $350 Billion Valuation

Anthropic, an AI start-up rivaling OpenAI, is reportedly seeking funding at a $350 billion valuation, with plans to raise $10 billion and potentially go public.

top.title: China Is Investigating Meta’s Acquisition of the AI Start-Ip Manus

top.title: Grok, Elon Musk’s A.I., Is Generating Sexualized Images of Real People, Fueling Outrage
top.snippet: Late Thursday, Mr. Musk’s chatbot, Grok, limited requests for A.I.-generated images on X to paid subscribers of the social media site amid an outcry from victims and regulators.

top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
Elon Musk's chatbot Grok faced backlash for generating sexualized images of real people, leading to restrictions on access to these images on social media.

top.title: Can A.I. Match Molière’s Wit? These Researchers Think So.
top.snippet: Scholars and artists at Sorbonne University trained artificial intelligence to imitate the French playwright’s themes, structures and sense of humor. The result is a new play.
top.rerankWhy: AI's cultural impact explored through Molière's themes
top.aiSummary:
AI-generated summary:
Researchers at Sorbonne University have trained AI to mimic Molière's wit, resulting in a new play that captures the French playwright's themes, structures, and sense of humor.

top.title: Microsoft introduces agentic AI tools to automate retail and B2B commerce operations
top.snippet:
Microsoft has announced a new set of agentic artificial intelligence (AI) tools to Copilot aimed at automating core retail and B2B commerce functions, including digital checkout, product data management, merchandising and store operations. The company said it designed the agentic AI tools, which it’s delivering through Microsoft Copilot and Copilot Studio, to reduce manual work, […]

top.title: Brands are upset that ‘Buy For Me’ is featuring their products on Amazon without permission
top.snippet: Online merchants say Amazon’s “Buy for Me” AI tool listed their products without permission, forcing them to opt out after the fact and raising concerns about brand control, customer trust and the impact of AI on shopping.

top.aiSummary:
AI-Generated Summary:
Online merchants are unhappy with Amazon's "Buy for Me" AI tool for featuring their products without permission, leading to concerns about brand control and customer trust in ecommerce.

top.title: Inflation set to remain sticky in 2026
top.snippet:
As we enter into 2026, inflation rates are increasing as prices continued to edge up at the end of last year. oneSentenceSummary: Nvidia's new A.I. chips and Shopify's record sales growth highlight significant advancements in technology and retail performance this week.
introParagraph: Nvidia releases new AI chips that enhance computational capabilities, while Shopify reports record sales growth, reflecting trends in ecommerce. The jewellery industry sees a shift in demand for De Beers diamonds amid ongoing inflation concerns.
